vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐπεισ-ᾰγωγή, ἡ,
bringing in besides, ἑτέρων ἰητρῶν [Refs 5th c.BC+]; especially of a second wife, [Refs 1st c.AD+]; προσώπων ἐ. introduction of new characters, [NT+1st c.BC+]
__2 means of bringing or letting in, ἐπεσαγωγὰς τῶν πολεμίων [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
introduction, bringing in
a superinduction, a further introduction, whether by way of addition or substitution, Heb. 7:19*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: (在原有之外) 帶進, 引入 (來 7:19)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: (在原有之外) 带进, 引入 (来 7:19)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sự dẫn vào; đưa vào. ἐπί (G1909) + εἰσάγω (G1521)
